description: This file initializes and interacts with ZepTools and an Agent to manage and query user memory data within a conversational AI context.

classes.name: ZepTools
classes.description: A utility class for managing Zep messages and memory.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent that can process and respond to queries.

methods.name: add_zep_message
methods.description: Adds a message to the Zep conversation history.

methods.name: get_zep_memory
methods.description: Retrieves the Zep memory of a specified type.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response to a given prompt.
